'''Plane of Euthymia''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter II]]: Act II - [[Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow]] quest ''[[Amidst Stormy Judgment]]'' and Act III - [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]] quest ''[[The Omnipresent God]]'', and the [[Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter]]: Act I - [[Reflections of Mortality]] quest ''[[The Lonesome Euthymia]]''.

In this Domain, the player engages in a battle against [[Raiden Shogun|Raiden]] [[Ei]].

{{Enemy Stats

==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''

===Phase 1===
* '''Slash Combo 1:''' Performs 3 slashes with her [[Engulfing Lightning|polearm]], dealing '''25% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. This attack is always used when Ei teleports to the player's left side.
** If the player is close to Ei after the first 3 slashes, performs 3 more slashes, dealing '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} with each slash. Ei dashes forward with the final slash and releases a flurry of slashes behind her, dealing '''12.5% ATK''', '''12.5% ATK''', '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
** If the player is far from Ei after the first 3 slashes, follows up with '''Lightning Blade'''.
* '''Slash Combo 2:''' Spins her polearm before dashing at the player and performing 4 consecutive strikes, dealing '''16.6% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''25% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Lightning Summon:''' Spins her polearm and summons lightning in a large area around her, dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. This attack cannot be dodged using [[Sprinting#Dash|dash]] [[Invincibility Frames|i-frames]]. This attack is always used when Ei teleports to the player's right side.
* '''Lightning Blade:''' Launches a fast vertical blade at the player, dealing '''33.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on contact. This attack is often used as a follow-up to '''Slash Combo 1''' but can also be used individually.
* '''Magatsu Electroculi:''' Summons three Magatsu Electroculi around the arena while [[Vacuum Field|pushing]] nearby players away from her. If not destroyed after a period of time, the Magatsu Electroculi explode violently, dealing '''133.3% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. If a player is within an area where multiple Electroculi's AoE overlap, they will be damaged multiple times. This attack can only be used once.
* '''Follow-Up:''' If the player is behind Ei shortly after she performs a '''Slash Combo''', swiftly turns around to perform a slash. Explosions will also occur on the ground along the slash's path. The slash and the explosion each deals '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Vision Hunt Decree:''' Deals '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} and locks all character's [[Elemental Skill]]s and [[Elemental Burst]]s, except for the [[Traveler]]'s.

Some time after the cast of '''Vison Hunt Decree''' during ''The Omnipresent God'', Ei will teleport to the center of the arena and start a cutscene, once this ends she will replace her polearm with the [[Musou Isshin]] and start phase 2.

===Phase 2===
* '''Slash Combo 3:''' Performs five consecutive strikes, dealing '''33.3% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK''', '''33.3% ATK ×2''', '''33.3% ATK + 16.6% ATK''', '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Slash Combo 4:''' Performs a circular slash and quickly repositions behind the player to perform another slash, dealing '''16.6% ATK ×2''', '''16.6% ATK''', '''58.3% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Slash Combo 5:''' Performs three consecutive slashes around her, dealing '''16.6% ATK''', '''16.6% ATK''', '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Iai: Cross-Slash:''' Dashes towards the player and slashes twice in a cross pattern, dealing '''8.3% ATK''', '''8.3% ATK''', '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Unbending Lightning:''' Launches three discs followed by a horizontal blade at the player, dealing '''33.3% ATK ×3''', '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on contact.
* '''Eyes of Stillness:''' Summons up to 3 eyes that unleash a flurry of slashes shortly after appearing, each dealing '''5.6% ATK ×4''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Musou no Hitotachi:''' Ei [[Vacuum Field|pushes]] nearby players away from her, while electro seeds descend around the arena, each dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} on landing and creating a field that deals '''12.5% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DoT}}. Ei then unleashes a flurry of slashes that temporarily freezes players in place within its AoE, dealing '''33.3% ATK ×4''', '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
* '''Follow-Up:''' If the player is behind Ei shortly after she performs certain attacks, swiftly turns around to perform a flurry of slashes, dealing '''66.6% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.

==Lore==
In the Plane of Euthymia, the [[Raiden Shogun]], [[Ei]], spends most of her time {{w|meditating}}, while having a [[The Shogun|puppet]] execute daily affairs in Inazuma. The Plane of Euthymia consists of her consciousness. After seeing all the ambitions in the [[Statue of the Omnipresent God]]'s enclosed Visions, she repeals the Vision Hunt Decree and disables most of her puppet's functions. Because of her isolation for centuries, the Raiden Shogun is unaware of the changes Inazuma has underwent. During the [[Reflections of Mortality]] act of the [[Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter]], Ei realizes that even though Inazuma has changed drastically, it is still Inazuma.

==Trivia==
* During [[Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow]], the boss' displayed name is "Raiden Shogun" and her title is ''The Seven: Electro Archon''.
* Despite not using Visions to channel their powers, even the Archons themselves are not able to cast their skills while the Vision Hunt Decree is effective.
